message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that I believe you'll find invaluable. I'm offering it to you for $140, which is a special deal considering its worth to you. Let me know if this works for you!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would you be able to offer the product for $130?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135 for the product. This is still a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose $130 as the price for the product.

I see, Bob. I'm glad we're finding common ground. Considering the value of the product to you, I'm willing to sell it to you for $132. This is a slight increase from your last offer, but I hope it's within your budget. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to propose $130 as the final price for the product.
Considering the value and quality of the product, I'm willing to sell it to you for $131. I hope this price meets your expectations. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose $130 as the final price for the product.

I understand your position, Bob. To finalize this transaction, I'm willing to sell the product to you for $131. This is the highest price I can offer while still maintaining its value. Let me know if this is acceptable!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to propose $130 as the final price for the product.
